title: Challenger/Master Tier Wanted Open Ladder

embed.description: Trials start this Thursday to Saturday 6:30 AEST. Roster announced Sunday.

body:
Applications Open for Team Slow Roll (OOL)
The management of Slow Roll is forming a new OOL roster for the 2017 Season with the ultimate goal of qualifying for OCS.
We are in high demand for Top Lane and Support players but will accept applicants from all roles.
Trials will run from Thursday 2nd until Saturday 4th of February after which team practice will commence for 3 nights per week leading up to the start of the season.
What is required?
1.	Highly reliable: You are expected to attend all practice nights on time. (3 nights for 3 hours per week)
2.	Challenger/Master (exceptions will be made for high diamond)
3.	Self motivated.
4.	Cooperation in a team environment.
5.	Accepting of feedback and criticism.
What we can provide for you?
1.	Experienced management team: Manager, Coach, Analyst with high level experience in OCE.
2.	League duties and obligations organized by management.
3.	Opportunities for gear rewards during the season.
If you are interested in applying fill out the google form below:
https://goo.gl/forms/00HHC6Lp7afSVvu13

replies.body: Need more mid, support, and top laners.

Hi guys, would love to join such a team!
For anyone looking for another team member (either as a regular or as a sub player), I'd be happy to play.
My peak rank is Platinum 1 (I didn't have much time to play ranked during school but, now that I have the time I believe I could get mid to high diamond), and I play all roles comfortably except ADC.
I use Discord and Skype primarily! And I am also a capable shotcaller if needed

Mid champs: Pretty much anyone
Jungle: Most tank junglers (Heca, Zac etc), Graves, Lee Sin
Top: Sion, Camille, Jayce, Kennen, most tank tops
Support: Thresh, Leo, Naut, Zyra, Brand, Karma, Blitz, Morg etc etc

Heres my OPGG: https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Blizzard9789
